actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Labor Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 to require that all officers of national labor organizations be elected by secret ballot of the members.

summary.text: Requires that all officers of national labor organizations be elected by secret ballot of the members.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Labor Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 to require that all officers of national labor organizations be elected by secret ballot of the members.
